name: SCE_RES_TYPE_INFO
description: This table stores resource type availability info.

columns.name: RESRC_AVAIL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number of the record used to store scheduling availability information for a provider.

columns.name: RESRC_AVAIL_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of an Area, Department or Location based on type of record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of an Area, Department or Location based on type of record.
